transcript: things of which 1 understand nothing; and the day before yesterday during my daily walk through the village I wit- nessed a heartrending scene. ... It was a convoy of conscripts enrolled from our people and start- ing to join the army. You should have seen the state of the mothers, wives, and children of the men who were going and should have heard the sobs. It seems as though mankind has forgotten the laws of its divine Saviour, Who preached love and forgiveness of injuries and
